name: Magnetic Rumble
description:
A Top Down Action Shooter (kind of) with tower defense mechanics.

Warning:

This game contains some minor camera shake, if you have epsilepsy or don't like camera shake you can turn it off in the settings.

Controls:

WASD / arrow keys : Movement

Space: Dash

R: Close / Open Shop

Escape: Close Menus

1-5: Placing Towers

You can buy turrets and support towers (like magnets, speed generator, etc.) in the shop! 

Description:

You play as a magnet and try to survive as long as possible by dashing into enemies from different game kinds and placing towers to kill them. But since you are a magnet, you pull things towards you. So be careful and don't get to close to them. There is always someone pulled towards you or trying to kill you, so you will never be alone. Can you manage the balance between using turrets and fighting without them?
